metadata.name: Microsoft Teams Sensitive File Access By Uncommon Applications
metadata.comment: Detects file access attempts to sensitive Microsoft teams files (leveldb, cookies) by an uncommon process.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('2') AND (contains(lower(file.name), lower('\\microsoft\\teams\\cookies')) OR contains(lower(file.name), lower('\\microsoft\\teams\\local storage\\leveldb'))) AND NOT endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\microsoft\\teams\\current\\teams.exe')))

output.summary: Detects file access attempts to sensitive Microsoft teams files (leveldb, cookies) by an uncommon process.
